capability.name: Security Advisory
capability.definition: Security Advisory capability provides specialized security guidance and advice to support organizational security arrangements across line management and project implementations.
capability.role: Provide specialist security advice and guidance for line management and projects as needed to ensure security arrangements across the organization
capability.example: Specialist security advice is sought for a major project

key_features.name: Specialist security advice provision
key_features.description: Enables specialist security advice provision to support security advisory capability provides specialized security guidance and advice to support organizational security arrangements across line management and project implementations
